body:
To prove your loyalty to the MidnightNemo ship, we are trying to get as many people as possible to change to this skin below:

http://www.minecraftskins.com/skin/6749940/midnightnemo/

Download and use this skin to raise awareness of the MidnightNemo ship!!

Skin users so far:
7 1/2

Fliikky(Nemo1197)
Triikky(Midnightstorm)
Tuscaloon
Radiatonn
Thrasilias
merntrux
retak
Smiley (Kinda)

replies.body:
I'm done. Not meaning to sound rude/harsh but no one really cares about MidnightNemo. You are just trying to make the whole community think it's true and then say it's not to gain attention. No one really cares and this thread should actually be locked. Good job, You and Nemo are friends; stop saying you aren't dating and then make all of these **** types of threads.


"Its a joke" Funny! You call a joke making spam topics, changing your skins, changing your names etc.

WE DONT CARE!

replies.body: I'm sorry you're.. offended? by any of this. It's supposed to be a light-hearted post to bind the community together, I didn't realize some people found it annoying. I also did not think this was a spam topic, just something funny. I also don't see the need for rudeness in this situation. Again, I'm sorry this bothered you, but if it really does bother you, I will ask you to please ignore it and move on. Thank you.

replies.body:
This post just got brought to my attention recently , i would agree it's not necessary. As you can see it is causing more arguments rather then community discussion. Also Nemo and Midnight i'm sure enjoy a joke but please remember not to take things too far as people can get genuinely  offended.

Locking.
